00035 #ifndef SePlatform_h
00036 #define SePlatform_h
00037 #define SePlatform_h

00043 // platform-specific includes
00044 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(_WINDOWS) || defined(_MSC_VER)
00045 #    ifndef WINDOWS
00046 #        define WINDOWS
00047 #    endif
00048 #    define _CRT_NONSTDC_NO_DEPRECATE 1
00049 #    define _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE 1
00050 #    define NOMINMAX 1
00051 
00052 // windows - defined for both Win32 and Win64
00053 #    include <Windows.h>
00054 #    include <malloc.h>
00055 #    include <io.h>
00056 #    include <tchar.h> 
00057 #    include <process.h>
00058 
00059 #else
00060 
00061 // linux/unix/posix
00062 #    include <stdlib.h>
00063 #    include <alloca.h>
00064 #    include <string.h>
00065 #    include <pthread.h>
00066 #    include <inttypes.h>
00067 // OS for spinlock
00068 #    ifdef __APPLE__
00069 #        include <libkern/OSAtomic.h>
00070 #        include <sys/types.h>
00071 #    endif
00072 #endif // defined(_WIN32)...
00073 
00074 // general includes
00075 #include <stdio.h>
00076 #include <math.h>
00077 #include <assert.h>
00078 
00079 // missing functions on Windows
00080 #ifdef WINDOWS
00081 #   define snprintf sprintf_s
00082 #   define strtok_r strtok_s
00083     typedef __int64 FilePos;
00084 #   define fseeko _fseeki64
00085 #   define ftello _ftelli64
00086 
00087     inline double log2(double x) {
00088         return log(x) * 1.4426950408889634; 
00089     }
00090 
00091     typedef unsigned int uint32_t;
00092 #   define M_E (2.7182818284590452354)
00093 #   define M_PI (3.141592653589793238)
00094 #   define UINT32_MAX (0xffffffff)
00095 #   define UINT32_MIN (0)
00096 #else
00097     typedef off_t FilePos;
00098 #endif

00101 namespace SeExprInternal {
00102 
00103     /*
00104      * Mutex/SpinLock classes
00105      */
00106 
00107 #ifdef WINDOWS
00108 
00109     class _Mutex {
00110     public:
00111         _Mutex()       { _mutex = CreateMutex(NULL, FALSE, NULL); }
00112         ~_Mutex()      { CloseHandle(_mutex); }
00113         void lock()   { WaitForSingleObject(_mutex, INFINITE); }
00114         void unlock() { ReleaseMutex(_mutex); }
00115     private:
00116         HANDLE _mutex;
00117     };
00118 
00119     class _SpinLock {
00120     public:
00121         _SpinLock()    { InitializeCriticalSection(&_spinlock); }
00122         ~_SpinLock()   { DeleteCriticalSection(&_spinlock); }
00123         void lock()   { EnterCriticalSection(&_spinlock); }
00124         void unlock() { LeaveCriticalSection(&_spinlock); }
00125     private:
00126         CRITICAL_SECTION _spinlock;
00127     };
00128 
00129 #else
00130     // assume linux/unix/posix
00131     class _Mutex {
00132      public:
00133         _Mutex()      { pthread_mutex_init(&_mutex, 0); }
00134         ~_Mutex()     { pthread_mutex_destroy(&_mutex); }
00135         void lock()   { pthread_mutex_lock(&_mutex); }
00136         void unlock() { pthread_mutex_unlock(&_mutex); }
00137     private:
00138         pthread_mutex_t _mutex;
00139     };
00140 
00141 #   ifdef __APPLE__
00142     class _SpinLock {
00143     public:
00144         _SpinLock()   { _spinlock = 0; }
00145         ~_SpinLock()  { }
00146         void lock()   { OSSpinLockLock(&_spinlock); }
00147         void unlock() { OSSpinLockUnlock(&_spinlock); }
00148     private:
00149         OSSpinLock _spinlock;
00150     };
00151 #   else
00152     class _SpinLock {
00153     public:
00154         _SpinLock()   { pthread_spin_init(&_spinlock, PTHREAD_PROCESS_PRIVATE); }
00155         ~_SpinLock()  { pthread_spin_destroy(&_spinlock); }
00156         void lock()   { pthread_spin_lock(&_spinlock); }
00157         void unlock() { pthread_spin_unlock(&_spinlock); }
00158     private:
00159         pthread_spinlock_t _spinlock;
00160     };
00161 #   endif // __APPLE__
00162 #endif
00163 }
00164 
00165 #endif // SePlatform_h
